Package com.github.actionfx.core.validation

Class ValidationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.validation.ValidationResult
  • public class ValidationResult
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the result of a performed validation. In case the validation status getStatus() is a different status than ValidationStatus.OK, there will be validation messages present in getMessages().
    Author:
    koster

    • Method Detail

      • overrideApplyValidationResultDecoration

        public void overrideApplyValidationResultDecoration​(boolean applyValidationResultDecoration)
        Overrides and sets the flag ValidationMessage#isApplyValidationDecoration() in all messages that are part of this validation result.

        In general, Validator instance can decide whether to display a validation decoration or not. However, the user of the validation method View.validate(boolean) can decide to override this decision and not to display any decoration.

        Important: The supplied boolean applyValidationDecoration is ANDed with the current flag, so that decoration for messages that are already disabled can not be enabled by this override flag.

        Parameters:
        applyValidationResultDecoration - flag that will be set in all validation messages inside this validation result

      • builder

        public static ValidationResult builder()
        Builder method for contructing a validation result via a builder pattern.
        Returns:
        the validation result instance to construct

      • ok

        public static ValidationResult ok()
        Convenient method for return a ValidationStatus with status ValidationStatus.OK.
        Returns:
        a validation result with status OK
